meanings.definition: A skirt that falls to the middle of the calf.
meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable midiskirt to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The midiskirt was a popular choice among the students.
meanings.sent3: The midiskirt danced in the breeze as she walked.
meanings.sent4: Her midiskirt was like a gentle wave around her legs.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow midiskirt stood out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: She decided to midiskirt to the party.
meanings.sent2: They midiskirted to the event without any fuss.
meanings.sent3: He midiskirted his way through the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The dancers midiskirted gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent5: Midiskirting added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
